impact_stories.venue: Expanding Horizons & Breaking Stereotypes: My Journey through the Public Speaking Masterclass by Hala Osman
Carla’s Journey: Empowering Youth, Advocating for Change, and Mastering the Art of Debate
My Leadership Journey: Riddhi Javali, Grade 12, Bengaluru, India

testimonials.location: Lucciana Zanella, Grade 10, Tomas Moro, Ecuador
testimonials.venue: I enjoyed the Take the World Forward Program and learned a lot about very important issues in our society and how to present in a better way.

testimonials.location: Gunvir Singh Kohli, Grade 10, G.D. Goenka Public School, Model Town, Delhi
testimonials.venue: The Take the World Forward platform gave me the opportunity to grow and learn. I have gained knowledge on various topics like leadership, problem solving, debating and many more. I have become more confident as a speaker and a presenter.

testimonials.location: Maria-Iliana Chiladki, Grade 9, Bavarian International School, Germany
testimonials.venue: The Research Scholars Program was an outstanding experience. I understood many approaches to learning such as organization, critical thinking, collaboration and communication skills.

testimonials.location: Maria Paz Ormeno, Grade 9, Givat Haviva International School, Israel
testimonials.venue: “The TWF experience was an empowering one, I got a chance to interact with people from across the world who are leaders in their communities, & kickstart my own project to tackle food waste in schools.

testimonials.location: Walter Mchana, Grade 10, Makini Schools, Kenya
testimonials.venue: The Impact and Research Fellowship guided me on how to do passion projects.Today, I am the founder of a school mental health project that had a schoolwide mufti day dedicated to its launch.

The best part of the program was the shared enthusiasm of our instructors. The program has taught me the fundamentals of medicine. I can now analyze and understand biomedical concepts in my daily life further.
